summary: A one‑dimensional collection of strings whose data lives on the Arkouda server. It uses offset and byte buffers to represent a segmented string array and offers Pythonic sequence operations together with extensive string processing capabilities such as searching, pattern matching, case conversion, splitting and concatenation, all executed remotely.
business_intent: Enable scalable, high‑performance manipulation of massive string datasets within the Arkouda environment, allowing users to work with remote string collections as if they were local while offloading computation to the server.
